## ðŸŽ¨ Design System Quick Reference

```css
/* Colors */
--primary-cyan: #00d9ff;
--purple-accent: #a855f7;
--teal-accent: #14b8a6;
--dark-bg: #0a0a0a;
--silver-text: #c0c0c0;

/* Effects */
- Glass-morphism: backdrop-filter: blur(20px)
- Quantum Glow: Cyan and purple shadows
- Smooth Transitions: cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1)
```

## ðŸ§ª Testing Quick Reference

```bash
# Start local server
python -m http.server 8000
# OR
npx http-server -p 8000

# Visit
http://localhost:8000/index.html
http://localhost:8000/dashboard.html

# Test API Gateway (in browser console)
const health = await checkEcosystemHealth();
const metrics = await getEcosystemMetrics();
```

## âœ… Pre-Commit Checklist

- [ ] Onboarding completed
- [ ] Changes tested locally
- [ ] No console errors
- [ ] Mobile responsive
- [ ] Links work
- [ ] No hardcoded secrets
- [ ] Follows existing style
- [ ] Changes are minimal
